nodes.text: A Speeder ferry was a commercial vehicle regularly seen on Coruscant hauling broken air- and landspeeders to repair shops. The speeder used a tractor beam and a remote-slave hookup to transport its cargo. In 7 ABY, the Palpatine Counter-Insurgency Front, led by Kirtan Loor, unsuccessfully attempted to use a speeder ferry, loaded with a vehicle filled with explosives, to destroy a bacta distribution center.
